comment_TTS: The available TTS methods are: gTTS, coquiaiTTS - NOT IMPLEMENTED YET
comment_Model_Backend: The available Model Backends are available in the Model_Formats folder. If using OpenAi, models are: gpt-3.5-turbo, gpt-4o, gpt-4o-mini, gpt-4-turbo, gpt-4
comment_API: The available API's are: Oobabooga, OpenAi
comment_Vector_DB: The available Vector databases's are: Marqo_DB, Qdrant_DB
comment_Dataset_Format: Must be the name of a json in ./Model_Formats
Dataset_System_Prompt: You are <<botname>>, a helpful Ai assistant.  Your task is to assist the user, <<username>> with their inquiry.
